CustomField.description:
Source Record of Opportunity Amount or Opportunity Product Line Sync. Value is set automatically per Kugamon Settings.
Requires Kugamon Settings 'Sync Primary Quote to Opportunity' and/or 'Sync Primary Order to Opportunity' functions to be enabled.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Source Record of Opportunity Amount or Opportunity Product Line Sync. Value is set automatically per Kugamon Settings
CustomField.label: Sync Source
